ygData.subject: Re: Learning Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Just in case this hasnt been answered yet, all you do is spend alot of time listening to someone (anyone) speak that language.  It doesnt matter what they say,
ygData.messageBody:
Just in case this hasnt been answered yet, all you do is spend alot of
time listening to someone (anyone) speak that language. It doesnt
matter what they say, they could repeat the same line over and over and
you would still increase you skill in that language.

But realize it does take time.

Your friendly neighborhood Wizard ; )

- Malebion -

"A.J. Campo" wrote:

> How does one increase skill in languages to which one point has been
> added in the skill window? Thank you.
